flows.title: Quick Purchase Path
flows.description: A quick action taker who knows roughly what they want, searches for a product category, adds an item to the cart, and initiates the checkout process.
user_goals: Find and purchase a general product
browser_actions: Navigate to homepage
Use the search bar to search for a broad product category (e.g., 'electronics')
Select the first available product from the search results
Add the selected item to the shopping cart
Proceed to the checkout process from the cart

flows.title: Detailed Category Exploration and Filtering
flows.description: A detailed researcher who explores a specific product category, applies filters to narrow down options, and then views an individual product's details.
user_goals: Explore products within a chosen category
Utilize filtering options to refine search
browser_actions: Navigate to homepage
Click on 'Categories' to view all product categories
Select any major product category (e.g., 'Home Goods')
Apply any available filter (e.g., 'price range', 'brand', or 'color') to the results
Select any product from the filtered results to view its details

flows.title: Deal Hunter's Journey
flows.description: A price/feature comparer looking for discounts or special offers, browsing the deals section, and potentially adding a promotional item to their cart.
user_goals: Add a discounted item to the cart
browser_actions: Navigate to homepage
Click on 'Deals' to view current promotions
Browse the deals and select any featured deal item
Add the selected deal item to the shopping cart
View the shopping cart to review the item

flows.title: Information Seeking for Services
flows.description: An information seeker researching non-product related company details, such as store locations or weekly advertisements, without the intent of immediate purchase.
user_goals: Access current weekly promotions and ads
browser_actions: Navigate to homepage
Click on 'Find Stores'
Navigate back to the homepage (using browser back or direct navigation)
Click on 'Weekly Ad' to view current advertisements

flows.title: Convenience Shopping (Pickup & Delivery)
flows.description: A mobile user or convenience-focused shopper exploring available fulfillment options like pickup or delivery, and then searching for items that can be ordered using these methods.
user_goals: Understand and select a preferred order fulfillment method
Search for products compatible with selected fulfillment
Add items to cart using convenience options
browser_actions: Navigate to homepage
Click on 'Pickup & delivery'
Confirm or select any available pickup/delivery option (e.g., 'Ship to address' or 'Store Pickup')
Use the search bar to search for a general product (e.g., 'household essentials')
Select any product from the results that appears available for the chosen fulfillment method
Add the selected item to the shopping cart
